title: Alibaba buys Rocket Internet's Pakistan ecommerce platform Daraz | Reuters
text:
FRANKFURT (Reuters) - Alibaba Group ( BABA.N ) has bought the entire share capital of Rocket Internetâ€™s ( RKET.DE ) South Asian ecommerce platform Daraz Group, Rocket Internet said on Tuesday.
FILE PHOTO: A sign of Alibaba Group is seen during the fourth World Internet Conference in Wuzhen, Zhejiang province, China, December 3, 2017. REUTERS/Aly Song/File Photo It did not disclose financial details.
Daraz, founded in Pakistan in 2012, operates online marketplaces in Pakistan, Bangladesh, Myanmar, Sri Lanka and Nepal. The unit will continue to operate under the same brand following the sale to Alibaba, Rocket said.
Reporting by Maria Sheahan; Editing by Tom Sims
